title: Bugsnax
description: Bugsnax takes you on a journey to Snaktooth Island, home of the legendary half-bug half-snack creatures , Bugsnax. Invited by intrepid explorer Elizabert Megafig, you arrive to discover your host nowhere to be found, her camp in shambles, and her followers scattered across the island alone and hungry Itâ€™s up to you to solve the mysteries of Snaktooth Island: What happened to Lizbert? What are Bugsnax and where do they come from? But most of all, why do they taste SO GOOD? THE HOUSE OF THE DEAD: Remake

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Quad Core 2.6 Ghz or equivalent
system_requirements.Graphics: 2GB DirectX 11 Video Card (Intel UHD 620, NVIDIA GT 920M)
